VACCINATION RECOMMENDATIONS: Two injections, at 9 and 12 weeks of age, are recommended, followed by a first booster 1 year later. In highrisk situations, a third vaccination at 16 weeks is recommended. Boosters should be for life, if infected with different strains. Vaccination of these cats is still recommended. 1
